references.paper_title: FaceForensics++: Learning to detect manipulated facial images
references.reason: This paper introduced a widely used benchmark dataset for evaluating deepfake detection methods, which is extensively used in the target paper for experiments.

references.paper_title: Celeb-DF: A new dataset for deepfake forensics
references.reason: This paper introduced a high-quality deepfake dataset (Celeb-DF) that is used in the target paper for cross-dataset generalization experiments.
This seminal work on diffusion models lays the theoretical foundation for the Stable Diffusion model, which is a core component of the proposed DiffusionFake framework.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced the Latent Diffusion Model (LDM), a key technique used in Stable Diffusion, which the DiffusionFake framework leverages for enhanced generalization.

references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This work introduces ControlNet, a method that guides the image generation process in diffusion models, which inspired the design of the Guide Module in DiffusionFake.
